content: I know it is important for the Media to put “Breaking News” headline out there. That’s their job. But when do they (Media) learn to discern what is news and what is “Bait”? Donald Trump knows how to play the Media and how to hide his workings behind the scenes. I want the real news! Let’s stick to the quantification of his appointments. That's is the most important issue on the table that will have the most devastating effect on this Country’s future for many many years and may bring an end to America as we know it. Donald Trump is putting people in place that will destroy all the hard work and progress that has been achieved over the last 100 years. Don’t let him throw a comment out there like, Flag burning, Barron, Rosie O’Donald, even Conflict of interest. The Congress will have to deal with that in due time. Let’s stick to the issues that are important…..
